name: Vairus
description:
Vairus is an online multiplayer browser game installed as a web extension.

Play for free while browsing  the web, catch all types of Vairus on your favourite website and discover all their Mutations.

Add your favorite sites to your Network, improve them by building Structures on them and expand your influence on the Web.

Discover the hidden Matrixes on the internet and join the challenge together with other Players.

View more info at playvairus.com
